org.dmd.dms.util
Class DmsSchemaParser

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.dms.util.DmsSchemaParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
DmcUncheckedOIFHandlerIF
public class DmsSchemaParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements DmcUncheckedOIFHandlerIF

This class parses files that conform to the Information Model Definition (IMD) schema and stores them in an SchemaManager.

Method Detail

parseSchema

public SchemaDefinition parseSchema(SchemaManager am,
                                    java.lang.String schemaName,
                                    boolean terse)
                             throws ResultException,
                                    DmcValueException
Parses the specified DMS file and any other schemas on which it depends.

This function calls on itself recursively to parse the specified schema file and the schemas on which it depends.

Parameters:
am - A base level manager that will be populated with the schemas we parse. This should be a newly constructed schema manager.
schemaName - The name of the schema. Schema specifications are found in files with a .dms extension that have been found by the DmsSchemaFinder.
terse - If true, only the name of the schema being parsed is displayed on System.out otherwise, the name of each file being read is printed.
Returns:
The requested schema is returned if all goes well, otherwise null is returned. NOTE: If WARNINGs are encountered, we still the schema - just check for the presence of WARNINGs on the result set when parsing is complete.
Throws:
ResultException
DmcValueException
DmcValueExceptionSet
